query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS weekly_reflections (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  weekNumber INT NOT NULL,
  surprised TEXT,
  applicationToFashion TEXT,
  nextWeekTest TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway04.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2Z84eR9hGvjGXHm.root --database NP47tTynZmxVqthUU3GTN2 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS weekly_reflections (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  weekNumber INT NOT NULL,
  surprised TEXT,
  applicationToFashion TEXT,
  nextWeekTest TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
